zh_description: 调身的体位法，调息的呼吸法，和调心的冥想法有改善身心灵的能力，减压养心，冷静思考，改善血液循环，增强身体及关节柔软度，提升内外在能量
en_description: Enrich your body, mind, and soul through series of body postures, breathing, and meditation. Yoga also reduces stress, brings you peace of mind, improves circulation, gains body and joint flexibility, and acheives inner and outer strength
zh_equipment: 瑜伽垫，瑜伽球，瑜伽砖，瑜伽绳，泡沫轴
en_equipment: Yoga Mat, Yoga Ball, Yoga Brick, Yoga Rope, Foam Roller
en_muscles: Shoulder, Abs, Back, Waist, and Gluteal

zh_description: 竞技性也带有趣味性的球类游戏及运动，增强体力，维持健康，有健身及健美效果。适合亲子及群体出游运动，到室外接近大自然能减压，减肥，更有助身心健康及愉悦。
en_description: A competitive and entertaining game or sports which features a ball as a part of play, increases energy, keeps you healthy, fit, and in shape. Family and groups engage in the natural settings to find excitement and keep fit, while enhance their inner perceptual and spiritual life
zh_equipment: 羽毛球拍，网球拍，壁球拍，高尔夫球杆，高尔夫手套，乒乓球拍
en_equipment: Badminton Racket, Tennis Racket, Squash Racket, Golf Clubs, Golf Gloves, Table Tennis Racket
en_muscles: Abs, Gluteal, Arms, Waist, Chest, Hips, Thighs

zh_description: 可以自己掌握跑步的速度、距离和路线的有氧运动。增加肺活量，改善体能，维持身心健康，肌肉刺激较全面，较佳排汗效果，让人精神加倍。无需特殊的场地、服装或器械。无论在运动场上或在马路上，甚至在田野间、树林中均可进行跑步锻炼。
en_description: Control your running pace, distance, and route with this aerobic endurance training. It also improves lung and athletic performance, keeps you healthy, tones muscles, with good perspiration effects that increases your energy and concentration. You can run anywhere without bringing additional gadgets in the tracks, streets, countryside, and woods
zh_equipment: 运动鞋
en_equipment: Running Shoes
en_muscles: Thighs, Joints

zh_description: 透过拳，踢，蹬等搏击动作缓解压力，燃烧热量，达到减肥，健美及健身效果。
en_description: Reduce stress and burn calories to achieve weight loss, beautiful waist lines, and fitness results under a sequence of punching, kicking, and feet sweeping movements
zh_equipment: 拳击手套，拳击绷带，拳击胶带
en_equipment: Boxing Gloves, Hand Wraps, Hand Tape
zh_muscles: 侧腰，腹部，大腿，手臂，肩背
en_muscles: Side Waist, Abs, Thighs, Arms, Shoulders and Back

zh_description: 运用拳，腿，膝，肘，出拳发腿、使膝用肘发力流畅顺达，力量展现极为充沛。高热量消耗可达到减肥，减压，及给女性防卫的效果。
zh_equipment: 拳击手套，拳击绷带，拳击胶带
en_equipment: Boxing Gloves, Hand Wraps, Hand Tape
zh_muscles: 侧腰，腹部，大腿，手臂，肩背
en_muscles: Side Waist, Abs, Thighs, Arms, Shoulders and Back

zh_description: 锻炼心肺功能的有氧运动，增强体力，维持健康，有健身及健美效果。随着音乐摆动充满娱乐性，韵律感，和节奏感。
en_description: Aerobics training improves cardiorespiratory system, increases energy, keeps you healthy, fit, and in shape. It is entertaining, groovy, and rhythmic as you dance with the music
zh_equipment: 健美操垫，健美球
en_equipment: Exercise Mat, Exercise Ball
en_muscles: Abs, Gluteal, Arms, Waist, Chest, Hips, Thighs

zh_description: 竞技性也带有趣味性的运动项目，增强体力，维持健康，有健身及健美效果。适合亲子及群体出游运动，到室外接近大自然能减压，减肥，更有助身心健康及愉悦。
en_description: A competitive and entertaining sports, increases energy, keeps you healthy, fit, and in shape. Family and groups engage in the natural settings to find peace and keep fit, while enhance their inner perceptual and spiritual life
zh_equipment: 泳衣，泳裤，泳帽，泳镜，自行车，登山鞋，水壶，登山杖，登山帽，滑冰鞋，滑板，轮滑鞋，花剑/重剑/佩剑，击剑防护服装，攀岩工具，攀岩手套，攀岩鞋

zh_description: 竞技性也带有趣味性的运动项目，增强体力，维持健康，有健身及健美效果。适合亲子及群体出游运动，到室外接近大自然能减压，减肥，更有助身心健康及愉悦。
